text:
We use Zscaler for proxy/web filter on individual nodes. It’s a very robust
solution but implementation can take some time. It also doesn’t natively work
well with VDI environments since users sign in to the agent. 
Thanks, 
Joe Harder 
Sr. Systems Administrator 
p 616-600-4154 | f 616-588-6218 
 
northpointe.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] RE: Proxy Servers
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from joe.harder@northpointe.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
We use Zscaler for proxy/web filter on individual nodes. It’s a very robust
solution but implementation can take some time. It also doesn’t natively work
well with VDI environments since users sign in to the agent. 
Thanks, 
Joe Harder 
Sr. Systems Administrator 
p   616-600-4154  |  f   616-588-6218 
joe.harder@northpointe.com 
northpointe.com
